description: Defines a Flutter widget for displaying a list of birthdays, including empty state handling.

classes.name: BirthdaysPage
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a list of birthday items or an empty state if no birthdays are available.

classes.name: _EmptyState
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that shows an icon, title, and subtitle to indicate an empty birthday list.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for BirthdaysPage and _EmptyState.
